name: GDrive_openworksheet_upload
description: Enhanced Google Drive upload workflow optimized for openworksheet integration with automatic folder management and comprehensive error handling
author: Mykhailo Bielov

documentation.overview: Enhanced Google Drive upload workflow specifically designed for openworksheet integration. Handles automatic folder creation, file downloads, uploads, and provides comprehensive status responses.

inputParameters.name: parentId
inputParameters.description: Google Drive parent folder ID where files will be uploaded

inputParameters.name: folderName
inputParameters.description: Name of the folder to create/find in parent directory

inputParameters.name: fileUrl
inputParameters.description: URL of the file to download and upload to Google Drive

inputParameters.name: fileName
inputParameters.description: Optional custom filename (will be extracted from URL if not provided)
